t: 10 Amazon Stores to Inspire Your Brand
s: April 11, 2024 - Stores are another free marketing tool provided by Amazon. They’re customizable so brands can stay true to themselves on the platform. A lot of brands use stores to mirror their own company website for consistency. This helps build brand integrity and stand out among the competition.
